reviewText: This video shows racism against the Chaldean native people of Mesopotamia by calling them something that insults the Chaldean people.  The makers of this video insist to instill fake identity that the Chaldean people that Chaldeans reject 100%.  It is sad how they deny Chaldeans their nationality while producing this video about persecution.  The Chaldeans of the world reject this insulting video.  It is not approved by any educated Chaldean.
Great film, gives a great layout of what our situation is in Iraq, and supplies plenty of justification as to why the Assyrians of Iraq need to work united towards an autonomous state.
A very important documentaty about the plight of the Assyrian nation..
